pull_requests.title: 383: Fix output scripts and reword minimal encoding explanation
pull_requests.body:
Fixes the output script template to correctly include the `n` value.

Also changed how the minimal encoding is described to just describe it rather than an exhaustive list.

Alternate to #1860

comment_list.body:
> ACK, perhaps give @dr-orlovsky co-authored-by credit for having found the issue.

Done
